Yong Kah HweeLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019I used to thknk like Wen Hao, until I attended the Dividend Machines course organised by The Fifth Person. You might want to look into that! I wish I knew about the course earlier because I spent quite a long time trying to get information through the web, and also making a few espensive mistakes along the way.1 comment0

Maybe you would like to share your few key takeaways from the event?

TWTay WenHaoLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 21 Apr 2019I feel that in this day and age you can get alot of information through the web. In fact, I actually started to invest all by myself through gaining knowledges from the web. The thing about self research is that you can do it at your own free time and its also free.A few keywords you can use for google search. Types of investment What is Regular savings plan (RSP)Dollar cost averaging (DCA)Bonds vs StocksHow to start investingCreating CDP account, trading account.0 comments0
